definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Any cigarettes in 1925 Guichi County Tax Bureau.
The maximum duty for one premium stick accounts for just Rs 1.
sentences.chinese: 一支优质卷烟的最高税收仅仅为1卢比。

sentences.english: I took a drag on the glowing cigarette and began coughing and sputter-ing from the smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我就着发热的卷烟吸了一口，被烟呛着，咳嗽起来。

sentences.english: Unit B1 packing is the main model in cigarette factory of china.
sentences.chinese: B1包装机组是我国很多卷烟厂的主力机型。

sentences.english: My father likes to roll his own cigarettes.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸喜欢自己卷烟抽。

sentences.english: One company, Eastern Company, has a monopoly on cigarette production and sales in Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 在埃及，东方公司拥有生产和销售卷烟的垄断权。

sentences.english: The judgment of cigaret quality has been noted by tobacco and medico health fields.
sentences.chinese: 卷烟质量评判一直被国内外烟草界和医疗卫生界关注。

sentences.english: Then he took out a tobacco pouch and a packet of papers and rolled himself a cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他接着掏出烟荷包和一盒卷烟纸卷了一支烟。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a cigarette maker knife head feed device.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种卷烟机刀头进刀装置。

sentences.english: Indonesian cigarettes make up 99 percent of the U. S. market for the kretek product.
sentences.chinese: 印尼卷烟占到了美国市场上丁香烟产品的99%。

sentences.english: The rolled cigarette between his teeth completed the picture as he used the door knocker.
sentences.chinese: 像往常那样，他衔着卷烟，拍打了一下门环。

sentences.english: The tax for tobacco for pipes and cigarettes is set at BGN 100 per kg.
sentences.chinese: 斗烟与卷烟用烟叶的税率定为每公斤100列弗。

sentences.english: Thus high-level containing hemp cigarette paper first chooses flax.
sentences.chinese: 高档含麻卷烟纸麻浆首选亚麻浆。

sentences.english: The Tobacco Manufacturers' Association reckons that 80% of hand-rolling tobacco is smuggled.
sentences.chinese: 烟草制造商协会估计有80%的手卷烟是走私来的。

sentences.english: These cigarettes are made with a mixture of the best tobaccos.
sentences.chinese: 这些卷烟是由最好的烟草配制成的。

sentences.english: The latter will affect mostly expensive cigarette brands.
sentences.chinese: 后一种烟税将主要对昂贵的卷烟品牌造成影响。
